Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Common Country Programming

ExpressionView.SQL: select ISO2, REGION, NAME from BASE_COUNTRY, CATEGORY where BASE_COUNTRY.ISO2 = CATEGORY.COUNTRY AND DTYPE = 'CountryRegion' and REGION <> 'Uncategorized'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='CountryIncomeStatus'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='JointProgrammeModality'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='SecondaryCountryIncomeStatus'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='AlternativeAnalysis'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='YesPartiallyNoNAQuestion'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='UNDAFPeriodAlignedWithGov'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='DaoSOPsImplementingLevel'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='YesNoNAQuestion'

select D.*, CP3.DESIGNATION, CP3.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP3JOINT_PROGRAMMES D, CP3COMMON_COUNTRY_PROGRAMMING CP3, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, V_CP_VALIDATED_DESIGNATIONS v WHERE CP3.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP3.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP3.ID = D.PARENT_ID AND CP3.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP3.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP3.DESIGNATION = bc.ISO2 AND CP3.DESIGNATION = v.DESIGNATION AND v.ENTITY_YEAR = CP3.ENTITY_YEAR and CP3.HAS_JOINT_PROGRAMMES=true

select cp3.ID, cp3.DESIGNATION, cp3.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, cp3.UNDAF_PERIOD_ALIGNED_WITH_GOV_ID, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNDAF, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN date(cp3undaf.DATE_OF_SIGNATURE) ELSE null END as DATE_OF_SIGNATURE, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN year(cp3undaf.START_DATE) ELSE null END as START_DATE, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN year(cp3undaf.END_DATE) ELSE null END as END_DATE, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN cp3undaf.TOTAL_PLANNED_BUDGET ELSE null END as TOTAL_PLANNED_BUDGET, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN cp3undaf.PREPARATION_PROCESS_MONTHS ELSE null END as PREPARATION_PROCESS_MONTHS, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.IS_DEVELOPING_NEWUNDAF = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as IS_DEVELOPING_NEWUNDAF, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_COMMON_COUNTRY_ASSESSMENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_COUNTRY_ASSESSMENT, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_COMMON_COUNTRY_ASSESSMENT = TRUE THEN cp3assessment.ASSESSMENT_YEAR ELSE null END as ASSESSMENT_YEAR, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_COMMON_COUNTRY_ASSESSMENT = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3assessment.HAS_DISAGGREGATED_DATA = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HAS_DISAGGREGATED_DATA, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_COMMON_COUNTRY_ASSESSMENT = FALSE THEN cp3assessment.OTHER_ANALYSIS_SOURCE_ID ELSE null END as OTHER_ANALYSIS_SOURCE_ID, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3plan.HASUNSUPPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HASUNSUPPORT, CASE WHEN cp3.HASMDGACCELERATION_FRAMEWORK = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASMDGACCELERATION_FRAMEWORK, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_JOINT_PROGRAMMES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_JOINT_PROGRAMMES, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFMID_TERM_REVIEW = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNDAFMID_TERM_REVIEW, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFMID_TERM_REVIEW = TRUE THEN date(cp3undafmid.DATE_COMPLETED) ELSE null END as HASUNDAFMID_DATE_COMPLETED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW = TRUE THEN date(cp3undafannual.DATE_COMPLETED) ELSE null END as HASUNDAFANNUAL_DATE_COMPLETED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFEVALUATION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNDAFEVALUATION, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFEVALUATION = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undafevaluation.MANAGEMENT_RESPONSE_PREPARED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as MANAGEMENT_RESPONSE_PREPARED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFEVALUATION = TRUE THEN date(cp3undafevaluation.DATE_COMPLETED) ELSE null END as HASUNDAFEVALUATION_DATE_COMPLETED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASMDGCOUNTRY_REPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASMDGCOUNTRY_REPORT, CASE WHEN cp3.HASMDGCOUNTRY_REPORT = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3mdgcountryreport.UN_ASSISTANCE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as UN_ASSISTANCE, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.UNDAF_EXTENSION_PRESENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as UNDAF_EXTENSION_PRESENT, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.THEORY_OF_CHANGE_INCLUDED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as THEORY_OF_CHANGE_INCLUDED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.COSTEDMEPLAN_PRESENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as COSTEDMEPLAN_PRESENT, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.UN_VISION2030PRESENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as UN_VISION2030PRESENT, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.UN_VISION2030PRESENT = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undafunvision2030.NRA_CONTRIBUTOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END ELSE null END as NRA_CONTRIBUTOR, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.COSTEDMEPLAN_PRESENT = TRUE THEN cp3undafcostedmeplan.YEAR_COMPLETED ELSE null END ELSE null END as YEAR_COMPLETED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3undaf.UN_VISION2030PRESENT = TRUE THEN cp3undafunvision2030.YEAR_PREPARED ELSE null END ELSE null END as YEAR_PREPARED, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW = TRUE THEN cp3undafannual.NRAS_PARTICIPATED_INUNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW_ID ELSE null END as NRAS_PARTICIPATED_INUNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW_ID, CASE WHEN cp3.IS_DEVELOPING_NEWUNDAF = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp3newundaf.NEWUNDAFROADMAP_PREPARED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as NEWUNDAFROADMAP_PREPARED, CASE WHEN cp3.IS_DEVELOPING_NEWUNDAF = TRUE THEN date(cp3newundaf.NEWUNDAFROADMAP_DATE) ELSE null END as NEWUNDAFROADMAP_DATE, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN date(cp3plan.NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_START_DATE) ELSE null END as NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_START_DATE, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN date(cp3plan.NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_END_DATE) ELSE null END as NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_END_DATE, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN cp3plan.SDGS_AND_AGENDA2030IN_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_ID ELSE null END as SDGS_AND_AGENDA2030IN_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_ID, CASE WHEN cp3.HAS_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN = TRUE THEN cp3plan.NRAS_PARTICIPATED_IN_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_ID ELSE null END as NRAS_PARTICIPATED_IN_NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN_ID, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFEVALUATION = TRUE THEN cp3undafevaluation.NRA_PARTICIPATED_ID ELSE null END as NRA_PARTICIPATED_ID, CASE WHEN cp3.HASUNDAFEVALUATION = TRUE THEN cp3undafevaluation.NRA_CONTRIBUTE_TO_EVALUATION_MANAGEMENT_RESPONSE_ID ELSE null END as NRA_CONTRIBUTE_TO_EVALUATION_MANAGEMENT_RESPONSE_ID from -- DERBY-PROPERTIES joinOrder = FIXED CP3COMMON_COUNTRY_PROGRAMMING cp3, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, CP3UNDAF cp3undaf, CP3COMMON_COUNTRY_ASSESSMENT cp3assessment, CP3NATIONAL_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN cp3plan, CP3UNDAFEVALUATION cp3undafevaluation, CP3MDGCOUNTRY_REPORT cp3mdgcountryreport, CP3UNDAFMID_TERM_REVIEW cp3undafmid, CP3UNDAFANNUAL_REVIEW cp3undafannual, CP3UNDAFUNVISION2030 cp3undafunvision2030, CP3NEWUNDAF cp3newundaf, CP3UNDAFCOSTEDMEPLAN cp3undafcostedmeplan WHERE cp3.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp3.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp3undaf.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3undafunvision2030.PARENT_ID = cp3undaf.id AND cp3undafcostedmeplan.PARENT_ID = cp3undaf.id AND cp3newundaf.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3assessment.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3plan.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3undafevaluation.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3mdgcountryreport.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3undafmid.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3undafannual.PARENT_ID = cp3.id AND cp3.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp3.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp3.DESIGNATION in (select iso2 from BASE_COUNTRY) and cp3.designation in (select v.designation from v_cp_validated_designations v where v.entity_year = cp3.ENTITY_YEAR)
